participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, enjoys expressing herself through dance and music.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i love new kids on the block. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and compassionate, thrives in social environments and values helping others.
participant_2.background: i volunteer in a homeless shelter. i'm a professional wrestler. i enjoy being around people. in my spare time i do volunteer work.
